lanka hospital ( pera apalo rohala) aayathanayata ayathwa thibu rakshana sansthawe kotaswalin 49% k hari jayawardhana wisin miladi gena athi athara, ohu wisin miladi gath mema kotas pramanaya gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathata idiriyedi labadimata niyamithaya.mema ganudenuwata adala giwisumata anuwa hari jayawardhanata lanka khanija thel nithigatha sansthawe sabhapathi dhuraya laba dunneya.

thrikunamalayata uthurin mulathiwu dakwa wena pradeshaye thiyena erakkandi, kumbaurupiddi, sinnakarachchi ha periyakarachchi, yanoya, kokilayi, kumalamune, alampil, nayaru ha nandikadal yana me athi sundara kalapu paddhathin athurenuth mage hith gaththa ha wadathma jaiwa wiwidhathwayakin hebi parisara paddhathi deka thamayi man hithana widiyata poduwakattu ha yanoya.
